summary_gpt: Jyothy Labs Limited has announced the transfer of unclaimed shares and dividends to the Investor Education and Protection Fund (IEPF) as per regulatory requirements, with notices sent to affected shareholders and details available on their website. The transfer pertains to shares with unclaimed dividends from FY 2017-18 to FY 2023-24, with the final transfer scheduled by September 26, 2025.

Jyothy Labs Limited has announced a conference call scheduled for May 12, 2025, to discuss its Q4 FY25 financial results and future outlook, with details available on their website and through registered access links. The filing primarily serves as an informational notice for analysts and investors about the upcoming event.

Jyothy Labs Limited has scheduled a Board meeting on May 12, 2025, to approve the audited financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2025, and to consider dividend recommendations for FY 2024-25. The results and decisions will be disclosed on their website and to investors.

Jyothy Labs Limited has scheduled a Board meeting on May 12, 2025, to approve the audited financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2025, and to consider dividend recommendations for FY 2024-25. The results and related information will be made available on the company's website.

Jyothy Labs Limited has issued notices to shareholders holding physical shares to update their KYC details, including PAN and nomination, in compliance with SEBI regulations, and has reminded them to dematerialize their shares. The company emphasizes the importance of these updates for continued dividend and interest payments, with a deadline of April 1, 2024.
